summary: This is an email exchange regarding scheduling a video interview with one of Jeffrey Epstein's former private chefs. An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York is organizing the interview and inviting another party to join.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the initial email who is scheduling a video interview with Epstein's former private chef and inviting a colleague to join.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as the former employer of the private chef who is the subject of the scheduled interview.

connections.description: The prosecutor is investigating Epstein and scheduling an interview with a former employee (chef) as part of that investigation.

events.title: Scheduling of interview with Epstein's former chef
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails a colleague to schedule a video interview with one of Jeffrey Epstein's former private chefs, inviting the colleague to join.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Prosecutors from the Southern District of New York were actively investigating Jeffrey Epstein's case as of October 2020.
Investigators were interviewing Epstein's former private chef, indicating they were gathering information from his household staff.
The communication shows coordination between legal officials in scheduling witness interviews.
